post.body: ... Enjoy ur ice day off
how do u clear all the twitted updates?
.... Stopped for ice ?
... But now u have all day to do ur honey doos ... Did not know the North
... So what's the latest ... Any date change .... Come on Hudson...
... Glad to hearing ur weekend went well ... Way to go ... TGBTG ...
sounds like a tough game but I heard they pulled through ... Yes I'm checking into the conference ....
is it snowing at the game
sounds good ... I'm having baked zitti frozen food style ... Now did I do this right?
it's 20 degrees and we're in line for the world famous Aquarium ... http://twitpic.com/ydcg
... Ok ... Eat some olives too ...
Eat a bread stick for Dad...
u can always play solitaire... http://twitpic.com/wk6q
what are u doing that has u eating dinner at 10 PM ?????
Off to minister to a wife who lost her lifemate last night ... Please say a prayer for her.
Looking forward to our report tonight from the mission that went to Germany to do the live nativity .... The Gospel spreads ...
Just spending time at home ... staying warm ... dry ... and enjoying my sweet wife.
Today HHBC's all staff Christmas Party at the Spaghetti Warehouse .... Friends .... Food .... Fun .... & Presents .... Doesn't get any b ...
Hung up on hold .. Going to Los Palmas to eat ... They say it's going to freeze in Nashville tonite ... Should be fun in the morning ,..
I'm on hold with a software company now for 20 min ... All just to get a receipt for a VISA charge .... Leasoned learned ...
Off to experience another Lord's Day ... My I be like the Shepherds who were amazed in His presence!
Toy store at heartbeat ministry was very busy .... Great to Serve families in need during this most wonderful time of the year ... I can ...
c in the background.
Going to Vittles for a great breakfast and the to the Hesttbeat Ministry with FairhRiders for our toy give away.
Going to get some items checked off the "to do" list with Julie today.
Still waiting on Hudson ... everything is progressing nicely ... Lindsay is a champ ... looking forward to seeing him soon!
At hospital with Dustin & Lindsay .... Hudson is on his way .... Waiting patiently .... Please pray for Lindsay that delievery will be quick
back from the big Chicago ... great day ... looking forward to tomorrow ... maybe Hudson will come after his big in Chic land.
Traffic in N IN is horrible...
We've stop for lunch and that will take an hour ... And we're about 190 miles out ... So it will be around 3-4 O'clock.
North of Louisville ... Didn't see Dr. Molher ... Must have been out fishing ... Pressing on into Indiana.
On I-65 heading North to see Dustin & Lindsay ... Nothing like a day on the road ...
Getting home for the evening ... HD TV here I come ... Oh yeah!
Welcome Chad and Justin to Twitter ... Ok guys get busy twitter away.
Off to the office today to take care of loose ends before heading to Crown Point tomorrow to spend a few days with Dustin, Lindsay & may ...
Off for my once a year church visit ... FBC Smyrna this year ... I hear they are really making an impact for the Gospel ... Looking to l ...
Had Christmas #2 with Drew & Celia ..... Next week is Christmas #3.
Just picked up our first HD TV ... 50 " ... On the way home to hook it up ... Got Drew & Daniel to help me out .... Yea!
Drew & Celia are here ... Yeah!
Out running around ... Believe it or not buy still getting Christmas done ...
